==Descriptions==
{{Description|A member of a loosely-organized mercenary corps from the golden desert sands. Will work for anyone as long as the pay is good.<br>These warriors use Ravenbeak Halberds in battle. It is said that ascetics who served the [[King Deshret|deity of the desert]] would carry these halberds as symbols of their office. These weapons once had a true name, but it has long been lost to the desert sands.|[[Archive]]}}
